title: Reborn as a Werewolf Ancestor - Novel Updates
tags: Bloodlines   Fantasy World   Sword And Magic
author: Euclid   欧克皮德
description:
Year 728.

On this mundane year, the new Baron of Eagle Castle was assassinated.

In response, an otherworldly soul transmigrated into the new baron's body and had to fight to save himself, awakening a special bloodline.

Sharp claws and teeth.

Scarlet eyes.

Silvery white hair.

Strong self-healing power.

The first werewolf on this continent was born!>
